name: mallabee/queue
description: Framework agnostic Queue Management for Beanstalkd, SQS, Redis, Database. easy to use in pure PHP projects as well as frameworks such as Symfony, Laravel, Yii2.

suggest.ext-pcntl: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.ext-posix: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver (^3.0).
suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the Redis queue driver (5.8.*).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the Beanstalk queue driver (^3.0).
suggest.league/event: For handling worker events, catching exceptions, interacting with queues, etc (^2.1)..
